badge.title: 1.2 Project Rationale
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, explain the project rationale.

badge.title: 1.3 Business Case
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, explain the business case.

badge.title: 2.2 Organizational Alignment
badge.description: On the discussion board, draft and explain how your mission and vision statements support the mission of the company.

badge.title: 2.3 Feedback
badge.description: On the discussion board, every team member must give feedback focusing on organizational alignment to another team.

badge.title: 3.2 HRA Choice
badge.description: On the discussion board, describe your team’s HRA choice and explain your rationale for the decision.

badge.title: 3.3 Employee Demographics
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, identify your companyâ€™s employee demographics and explain how they will support the proposed program.

badge.title: 3.4 Other Data
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, identify other relevant sources of data and explain how they will support the program.

badge.title: 3.5 Types of Surveys / Instruments
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, identify the types of surveys and instruments to be used.

badge.title: 4.2 Draft Goals
badge.description: On the discussion board, post 3 draft goals and your rationale for goal selection.

badge.title: 4.3 Feedback
badge.description: On the discussion board, every team member must give feedback to other teams about their goal selection.

badge.title: 4.4 Action Items
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, introduce action items for team project management.

badge.title: 4.5 Draft Timeline
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, introduce the project timeline.

badge.title: 4.6 Program Ideas
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, introduce program ideas to meet each goal.

badge.title: 5.2 Team Charter
badge.description: In the Dropbox, submit a team wellness charter.

badge.title: 5.3 Branding
badge.description: In the Phase I presentation, introduce your branding ideas for the wellness program.

badge.title: 6.2 Feedback
badge.description: Each team member must submit feedback on other teams’ presentations to the instructor.

badge.title: 6.3 Revision
badge.description: Based on feedback you receive, submit your presentation revisions and rationale to the instructor.

badge.title: 8.2 Awareness
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, consider the role of awareness in your program.

badge.title: 8.3 Intervention
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, consider the role of intervention in your program.

badge.title: 8.4 Environment
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, consider the role of environment in your program.

badge.title: 8.5 Incentives
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, consider the role of incentives in your program.

badge.title: 9.2 Draft Budget
badge.description: On the discussion board, post a draft budget.

badge.title: 9.3 Feedback
badge.description: On the discussion board, each team member must review another team’s budget and give feedback.

badge.title: 10.2 Types of Models and Use in Interventions
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, explain the types of models and the use of interventions in your program.

badge.title: 10.3 Communication
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, explain the role of communication in your program.

badge.title: 10.4 Employee Involvment
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, explain the role of employee involvement in your program.

badge.title: 10.5 Delivery Strategies
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, identify and explain the delivery strategies you will use for your program.

badge.title: 11.2 Evaluation Plan
badge.description: Submit an evaluation plan for your program to the instructor.

badge.title: 11.3 Return on Investment
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, project the return on investment for your program.

badge.title: 11.4 Measured Changes in Health Risk Factors
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, explain the measured changes in health risk factors.

badge.title: 11.5 Evaluation of Culture Change
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, explain the evaluation of culture change.

badge.title: 11.6 Evaluation of Goals and Objectives
badge.description: In the Phase II presentation, explain the evaluation of your goals and objectives.

badge.title: 1.1 Background / Situation Overview
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of the project’s background and situation overview by explaining the project rationale and business case in your presentation.

badge.title: 2.1 Mission / Vision / Values
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of Mission, Vision, and Values by drafting mission and vision statements and giving feedback to another team.

badge.title: 3.1 Individual / Organization Assessment - Data
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of individual and organizational assessment by applying all of the relevant data from the topic areas in this section to your case and by identifying surveys and instruments to be used.

badge.title: 4.1 Goals and Objectives
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of goals and objectives by drafting goals for the program, giving feedback to another team, identifying action items, drafting a project timeline, and identifying program ideas that support your goals.

badge.title: 5.1 Formulation of a Wellness Committee
badge.description: Your team formed a wellness committee, drafted a team charter, and branded the program.

badge.title: 6.1 Phase I Presentation
badge.description: Your team presented on the items in Phase I, provided feedback to another team, and revised your presentation.

badge.title: 8.1 Health Promtion Program Components and Actitivies
badge.description: Your team considered awareness, intervention, environment, and the role of incentives and how they apply to your case.

badge.title: 9.1 Budgeting
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of budgeting by drafting a budget for your program and providing feedback to another team.

badge.title: 10.1 Motivating Behavior Change
badge.description: Your team identified types of models and use in interventions, as well as communication, employee involvement, and delivery strategies you will use in your program.

badge.title: 11.1 Evaluating Health Promotion Programs
badge.description: Your team explained how you will evaluate the program and considered the evaluation plan, return on investment, measuring changes in health risk factors, evualuation of culture change, and evaluation of goals and objectives.

badge.title: 12 Phase II Presentation
badge.description: Your team presented on all of the topics in Phase II.

badge.title: 14 Sell the CEO
badge.description: On the discussion board, post the strategies you will use and information you will consider to sway and influence decisions of each type of executive.

badge.title: 15 Final Presentation
badge.description: Craft and deliver a presentation and supporting materials to sell your program to the CEO.

badge.title: 7.1 Phase I Complete
badge.description: Congratulations! Your team has completed Phase I of the project.

badge.title: 13 Phase II Complete
badge.description: Congratulations! Your team has completed Phase II of the project.

badge.title: 16 Phase III Complete
badge.description: Congratulations! Your team has completed the entire project!
